SuncéBeat Festival, Croatia

July 23 - August 30

| £125

Event Navigation

  • « Motion Notion Festival, Canada
  • Stop Making Sense Festival, Croatia »

We are thrilled to share with you the complete line up for SuncéBeat, our fifth Adriatic adventure that will mark the third year in our new Tisno home.

For those who haven’t yet felt the Dalmatian magic, be sure to check out the photos and videos below. It truly is a magnificent corner of the world, and, with a festival line up as bubbling with soul as the one we’re about to share with you below, it promises to be another tear-jerking ride!

So without further ado, here is the line up of international stars who will be joining the beautiful worldwide musical family on Tisno’s glistening shores as we dance under the stars till dawn!

Tickets are priced at just £125. Click here to get yours today! Please note that we do not sell day tickets for SuncéBeat. Each ticket includes full access to the entire festival site for the week, and entry to the magical Barbarella’s after parties. Mark the date in your diaries to be the first in line for our fifth birthday in the scorching Tisno sun!

The Festival Site
The Garden Tisno is set in a gently hilly area which overlooks our own private bay with a shimmering sandy beach and crystal clear waters. The village of Tisno, split between the mainland and the island of Murter, is just a ten-minute walk away, with a host of restaurants, cafes, apartments and small boutique hotels. Situated between Zadar and Split airports, our musical haven is easy accessible from all over Europe. Check out a range of travel options here.

Once the sun sets on the beautiful Dalmatian coast, we’ll take you to Barbarella’s, a magnificent, outdoor afterhours club we can party under the stars with the worldwide SuncéBeat family.

As usual we’ll be running our twice daily parties on the Argonaughty, including sunset trips close to the wonderful Kornati Islands, partying around the main stage and Tiki bar by day and Barbarella’s club by night. The entire site runs along a shimmering shoreline: dancing beside the glittering waters under a sizzling sun or a moonlit sky, and with fiery Funktion 1 systems installed across the site, it will sound as good as it looks!

Memories!
The cold weather is now upon us, but we’re already planning next year’s adventure… Check out a few of these videos to help lift any SuncéBlues!

SuncéBeat is a sparkling gem in the Croatian festival scene, the sister event to the UK’s legendary Southport Weekender. It was the first festival to bring deep house titan Larry Heard, Detroit enigma Moodymann and the semi-mythical DJ Harvey to the Croatian coast, and this year’s line up is the strongest yet with jazz-funk legend Lonnie Liston Smith headlining the outdoor stage.
